channel.title: Comments on: Issue 033 Author Interview: Diana Hurlburt and “The Palm Bride”
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: ridetbred
item.dc:creator: ridetbred
item.description: As a character-driven reader, I was enchanted (ha!) by the characters in this story, as well as the content. As one of the pagans who is familiar with poppets, restless spirits and created servitors I think you handled the embodiment of Ada Nuit so adroitly, I'm surprised to hear that you're not one of us!
item.content:encoded: As a character-driven reader, I was enchanted (ha!) by the characters in this story, as well as the content. As one of the pagans who is familiar with poppets, restless spirits and created servitors I think you handled the embodiment of Ada Nuit so adroitly, I’m surprised to hear that you’re not one of us!
